darshanas.title: Mīmāṃsā
darshanas.subtitle: The Science of Sacred Rituals
darshanas.description: Master the ancient art of interpreting Vedic texts and performing sacred rituals with perfect precision. Unlock the power of mantras and ceremonial wisdom that connects you directly to divine forces.
darshanas.shortDescription: Sacred ritual interpretation and ceremonial wisdom

gamificationElements.progressPath: Novice → Acolyte → Ritual Master → Sacred Interpreter

darshanas.title: Nyāya
darshanas.subtitle: The Path of Logical Reasoning
darshanas.description: Sharpen your mind with the most sophisticated system of logic ever developed. Master the art of debate, critical thinking, and discovering absolute truth through systematic reasoning.

gamificationElements.progressPath: Student → Debater → Logic Master → Truth Keeper

darshanas.title: Vaiśeṣika
darshanas.subtitle: The Atomic Science of Reality
darshanas.description: Explore the fundamental building blocks of the universe through ancient atomic theory. Understand how consciousness, matter, and energy interact to create all of reality.
darshanas.shortDescription: Atomic theory and fundamental reality principles

gamificationElements.progressPath: Observer → Analyzer → Reality Architect → Cosmic Designer

darshanas.title: Sāṃkhya
darshanas.subtitle: The Analytical Path to Liberation
darshanas.description: Understand the dual nature of consciousness (Purusha) and matter (Prakriti). Master the 24 cosmic principles and achieve liberation through pure analytical knowledge.

gamificationElements.progressPath: Seeker → Analyst → Consciousness Sage → Liberation Master

darshanas.title: Yoga
darshanas.subtitle: The Path of Divine Union
darshanas.description: Transform your life through the eight-limbed path of Patanjali. Master meditation, ethical living, and achieve complete union with the divine consciousness.
darshanas.shortDescription: Spiritual discipline and divine union practices

gamificationElements.progressPath: Practitioner → Yogi → Union Master → Divine Vessel

darshanas.title: Vedānta
darshanas.subtitle: The Ultimate Truth of Non-Duality
darshanas.description: Realize the highest truth that you and the universe are one. Master the profound wisdom of Advaita and achieve complete spiritual liberation and enlightenment.
darshanas.shortDescription: Non-dual wisdom and ultimate truth realization

gamificationElements.progressPath: Student → Scholar → Enlightened Sage → Liberated Being

dailyQuests: Complete one lesson in any darshana
Read one Sanskrit verse with translation
